Constructor Detail

RecordFactory

protected RecordFactory()
Constructor used by subclasses to create an instance of the RecordFactory class in order to extend the functionality of this class. Since the class is an utility class, the protected modifier on the default constructor prevents instances of this class from being created.
Method Detail

createEmptyRecord

public static RecordIF createEmptyRecord()
createEmptyRecord creates and returns a RecordIF object with no fields or associated values, hence empty.
Returns:
an empty Ljjb.toolbox.util.RecordIF object.

buildRecord

public static RecordIF buildRecord(java.util.Map t)
buildRecord constructs a new RecordIF object initialized with the contents of the Map object parameter. The newly created RecordIF object will be modifiable with no key field specified.
Parameters:
t - is a Ljava.util.Map object used to set the contents of the RecordIF object created by this method.
Returns:
a Ljjb.toolbox.util.RecordIF object containing the contents of the Map object.

buildRecord

public static RecordIF buildRecord(java.util.Map t,
                                   boolean readOnly)
This overloaded buildRecord method constructs a new RecordIF object initialized with the contents of the Map object parameter allowing this record's modifyiable attribute to be specified with the readOnly parameter. No key field is specified in this record.
Parameters:
t - is a Ljava.util.Map object used to set the contents of the RecordIF object created by this method.
readOnly - is a boolean value determining whether this record can be modified or not.
Returns:
a Ljjb.toolbox.util.RecordIF object containing the contents of the Map object.

buildRecord

public static RecordIF buildRecord(java.util.Map t,
                                   java.lang.String keyField)
This overloaded buildRecord method constructs a new RecordIF object initialized with the contents of the Map object parameter and the designated key field. The newly created record object is modifyiable.
Parameters:
t - is a Ljava.util.Map object used to set the contents of the RecordIF object created by this method.
keyField - is a Ljava.lang.String specifying the identity (unique) field of the record object.
Returns:
a Ljjb.toolbox.util.RecordIF object containing the contents of the Map object.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the key field does not exist in the Map object, or if the keyField was specified and the Map is null.

buildRecord

public static RecordIF buildRecord(java.util.Map t,
                                   boolean readOnly,
                                   java.lang.String keyField)
This overloaded buildRecord method constructs a new RecordIF object initialized with the contents of the Map object parameter and the designated key field. The record's modifyiable attribute is specified with the read-only boolean parameter.
Parameters:
t - is a Ljava.util.Map object used to set the contents of the RecordIF object created by this method.
readOnly - is a boolean value determining whether this record can be modified or not.
keyField - is a Ljava.lang.String specifying the identity (unique) field of the record object.
Returns:
a Ljjb.toolbox.util.RecordIF object containing the contents of the Map object.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the key field does not exist in the Map object, or if the keyField was specified and the Map is null.

buildRecordTable

public static RecordTableIF buildRecordTable(java.sql.ResultSet RS)
                                      throws RecordException
buildRecordTable constructs a RecordTableIF Collection object from the ResultSet object, obtained from running a database query (SQL statement) and used to initialize the RecordTableIF object returned from this method.
Parameters:
RS - is a Ljava.sql.ResultSet object, obtained from running a SQL statement against a databse, and used to initialize the RecordTableIF object contents.
Returns:
a Ljjb.toolbox.sql.RecordTableIF object containng the contents of the ResultSet object.

buildRecordTable

public static RecordTableIF buildRecordTable(java.sql.ResultSet RS,
                                             boolean readOnly)
                                      throws RecordException
buildRecordTable constructs a RecordTableIF Collection object from the ResultSet object, obtained from running a database query (SQL statement) and used to initialize the RecordTableIF object returned from this method.
Parameters:
RS - is a Ljava.sql.ResultSet object, obtained from running a SQL statement against a databse, and used to initialize the RecordTableIF object contents.
readOnly - is a boolean parameter determining whether this RecordTableIF object can be modified or not.
Returns:
a Ljjb.toolbox.sql.RecordTableIF object containng the contents of the ResultSet object.
Throws:
a - Ljjb.toolbox.util.RecordException if the record table cannot be constructed, due to an exception condition.

buildDetailedRecordTable

public static RecordTableIF buildDetailedRecordTable(java.sql.ResultSet RS)
                                              throws RecordException
buildDetailedRecordTable creates an instance of the DetailedRecordTable class initialized with the contents of the given ResultSet object. This record table class also stores meta-data information about the columns of this record table. The record table object returned from this method is modifyiable.
Parameters:
RS - is a Ljava.sql.ResultSet object, obtained from running a SQL statement against a databse, and used to initialize the RecordTableIF object contents.
Returns:
a Ljjb.toolbox.util.DetailedRecordTable object containing the contents of the ResultSet object and containing meta-data information about the columns in the record table.
Throws:
a - Ljjb.toolbox.util.RecordException if the record table cannot be constructed, due to an exception condition.

buildDetailedRecordTable

public static RecordTableIF buildDetailedRecordTable(java.sql.ResultSet RS,
                                                     boolean readOnly)
                                              throws RecordException
buildDetailedRecordTable creates an instance of the DetailedRecordTable class initialized with the contents of the given ResultSet object. This record table class also stores meta-data information about the columns of this record table. The record table's modifyiable attribute is specified with the readOnly parameter.
Parameters:
RS - is a Ljava.sql.ResultSet object, obtained from running a SQL statement against a databse, and used to initialize the RecordTableIF object contents.
readOnly - is a boolean parameter determining whether this RecordTableIF object can be modified or not.
Returns:
a Ljjb.toolbox.util.DetailedRecordTable object containing the contents of the ResultSet object and containing meta-data information about the columns in the record table.
Throws:
a - Ljjb.toolbox.util.RecordException if the record table cannot be constructed, due to an exception condition.
